landing.noapp: A wu lavi app leswaku u yi tirhisa {{ BRAND }} eka riqingho kumbe thebulete ya wena!
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) i ndlela leyinene yo hlangana ni vanghana lavantshwa.  {{ BRAND }}, hi hlawula munhu un’wana hi ku landzelelana ivi hi ku pfumelela ku vulavula un’we-un’we.   <6>Mimpimanyeto na swipimelo</6>, na <8>Swiletelo swa vaaki</8> for info hi de do's na don'ts eka ku tirhisa {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} video chat yi AI moderated kambe ku hava moderation leyi hetisekeke.  {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>U fanele ku va na malembe ya 18 (kumbe vunyingi bya le nawini eka vulawuri bya wena) kumbe ku tlula ku tirhisa {{BRAND}}</0>.  {{BRAND}}'s <4>Mimpimanyeto na swipimelo</4> for more info.  <6>https://www.connectsafely.org/swilawuri</6> swin’we ni tindhawu tin’wana.
landing.pleaseleave: Hi kombela u suka eLamdazle u endzela sayiti ya vanhu lavakulu ematshan’wini ya sweswo loko ku ri sweswo leswi u swi lavaka naswona u ri na 18 (kumbe vunyingi bya le nawini eka vulawuri bya wena) kumbe ku tlula.
landing.termscheck: Hi ku cheka bokisi u pfumela leswaku u kambisise agree to be bound by {{BRAND}}'s <3>Mimpimanyeto na swipimelo</3>, . <5>Pholisi ya vuhlayiseki bya vuxokoxoko</5> na <7>Swiletelo swa vaaki</7>.
landing.agecheck: A wu nge tirhisi vukorhokeri lebyi loko u ri ehansi ka malembe ya 18 kumbe u ri na malembe ya vukulu bya le nawini eka vulawuri bya wena.  <1>Mimpimanyeto na swipimelo</1> for more info. <3>Hi ku cheka bokisi u pfumela no yimela leswaku u na malembe ya 18 (kumbe vunyingi bya le nawini eka vulawuri bya wena) kumbe ku tlula.</3>

chat.error: Xihoxo xa ku hlanganisa na sevha: Hi kombela u ringeta nakambe
chat.nocam: Xihoxo xa khamera: Xitirhisiwa lexi komberiweke a xi kumeki

chat.language: Havumbirhi bya n’wina mi vulavula ririmi rin’we.  {{"Any"}} eka menyu ya ririmi ku tshikisa.
chat.simulated: Stranger a nga ha va a tirhisa webcam leyi tekeleriweke
chat.typing: Stranger u ri karhi a thayipa
chat.interests: Kuma vanhu lava u nga va tiviki lava nga ni swilo leswi fanaka leswi u swi tsakelaka
